vdom.name: vdom
vdom.help: Interface is in this virtual domain (VDOM).

fortilink.name: fortilink
fortilink.help: Enable FortiLink to dedicate this interface to manage other Fortinet devices.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable FortiLink to dedicated interface for managing FortiSwitch devices.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable FortiLink to dedicated interface for managing FortiSwitch devices.

switch-controller-source-ip.name: switch-controller-source-ip
switch-controller-source-ip.help: Source IP address used in FortiLink over L3 connections.

options.name: outbound
options.help: Source IP address is that of the outbound interface.

options.name: fixed
options.help: Source IP address is that of the FortiLink interface.

options.name: fqdn
options.help: DHCP option in domain search option format.

distance.name: distance
distance.help: Distance for routes learned through PPPoE or DHCP, lower distance indicates preferred route.

dhcp-relay-interface-select-method.name: dhcp-relay-interface-select-method
dhcp-relay-interface-select-method.help: Specify how to select outgoing interface to reach server.

options.name: sdwan
options.help: Set outgoing interface by SD-WAN or policy routing rules.

dhcp-relay-interface.name: dhcp-relay-interface
dhcp-relay-interface.help: Specify outgoing interface to reach server.

dhcp-relay-vrf-select.name: dhcp-relay-vrf-select
dhcp-relay-vrf-select.help: VRF ID used for connection to server.

dhcp-broadcast-flag.name: dhcp-broadcast-flag
dhcp-broadcast-flag.help: Enable/disable setting of the broadcast flag in messages sent by the DHCP client (default = enable).

dhcp-relay-service.name: dhcp-relay-service
dhcp-relay-service.help: Enable/disable allowing this interface to act as a DHCP relay.

dhcp-relay-source-ip.name: dhcp-relay-source-ip
dhcp-relay-source-ip.help: IP address used by the DHCP relay as its source IP.

dhcp-relay-request-all-server.name: dhcp-relay-request-all-server
dhcp-relay-request-all-server.help: Enable/disable sending of DHCP requests to all servers.

options.name: disable
options.help: Send DHCP requests only to a matching server.

options.name: enable
options.help: Send DHCP requests to all servers.

dhcp-relay-allow-no-end-option.name: dhcp-relay-allow-no-end-option
dhcp-relay-allow-no-end-option.help: Enable/disable relaying DHCP messages with no end option.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable relaying DHCP messages with no end option.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable relaying DHCP messages with no end option.

dhcp-classless-route-addition.name: dhcp-classless-route-addition
dhcp-classless-route-addition.help: Enable/disable addition of classless static routes retrieved from DHCP server.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable addition of classless static routes retrieved from DHCP server.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable addition of classless static routes retrieved from DHCP server.

management-ip.name: management-ip
management-ip.help: High Availability in-band management IP address of this interface.

ip.name: ip
ip.help: Interface IPv4 address and subnet mask, syntax: X.X.X.X/24.

allowaccess.name: allowaccess
allowaccess.help: Permitted types of management access to this interface.

options.name: scim
options.help: System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) access.

gwdetect.name: gwdetect
gwdetect.help: Enable/disable detect gateway alive for first.

options.name: enable

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable detect gateway alive for first.

detectserver.name: detectserver
detectserver.help: Gateway's ping server for this IP.

detectprotocol.name: detectprotocol
detectprotocol.help: Protocols used to detect the server.

ha-priority.name: ha-priority
ha-priority.help: HA election priority for the PING server.

fail-detect.name: fail-detect

fail-detect-option.name: fail-detect-option
fail-detect-option.help: Options for detecting that this interface has failed.

options.name: detectserver
options.help: Use a ping server to determine if the interface has failed.

options.name: link-down
options.help: Use port detection to determine if the interface has failed.

fail-alert-method.name: fail-alert-method
fail-alert-method.help: Select link-failed-signal or link-down method to alert about a failed link.

fail-action-on-extender.name: fail-action-on-extender

fail-alert-interfaces.name: fail-alert-interfaces
fail-alert-interfaces.help: Names of the FortiGate interfaces to which the link failure alert is sent.

dhcp-renew-time.name: dhcp-renew-time
dhcp-renew-time.help: DHCP renew time in seconds (300-604800), 0 means use the renew time provided by the server.

ipunnumbered.name: ipunnumbered
ipunnumbered.help: Unnumbered IP used for PPPoE interfaces for which no unique local address is provided.

username.name: username
username.help: Username of the PPPoE account, provided by your ISP.

pppoe-egress-cos.name: pppoe-egress-cos
pppoe-egress-cos.help: CoS in VLAN tag for outgoing PPPoE/PPP packets.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable IP address negotiating for unnumbered.

options.name: disable

idle-timeout.name: idle-timeout
idle-timeout.help: PPPoE auto disconnect after idle timeout seconds, 0 means no timeout.

disc-retry-timeout.name: disc-retry-timeout
disc-retry-timeout.help: Time in seconds to wait before retrying to start a PPPoE discovery, 0 means no timeout.

padt-retry-timeout.name: padt-retry-timeout
padt-retry-timeout.help: PPPoE Active Discovery Terminate (PADT) used to terminate sessions after an idle time.

lcp-echo-interval.name: lcp-echo-interval
lcp-echo-interval.help: Time in seconds between PPPoE Link Control Protocol (LCP) echo requests.

lcp-max-echo-fails.name: lcp-max-echo-fails
lcp-max-echo-fails.help: Maximum missed LCP echo messages before disconnect.

defaultgw.name: defaultgw
defaultgw.help: Enable to get the gateway IP from the DHCP or PPPoE server.

dns-server-override.name: dns-server-override
dns-server-override.help: Enable/disable use DNS acquired by DHCP or PPPoE.

options.name: enable

options.name: disable
options.help: No not use DNS acquired by DHCP or PPPoE.

options.name: cleartext
options.help: DNS over UDP/53, DNS over TCP/53.

pptp-timeout.name: pptp-timeout
pptp-timeout.help: Idle timer in minutes (0 for disabled).

options.name: global
options.help: BFD behavior of this interface will be based on global configuration.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable BFD on this interface and ignore global configuration.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable BFD on this interface and ignore global configuration.

reachable-time.name: reachable-time
reachable-time.help: IPv4 reachable time in milliseconds (30000 - 3600000, default = 30000).

vlanforward.name: vlanforward
vlanforward.help: Enable/disable traffic forwarding between VLANs on this interface.

options.name: rpl-bridge-ext-id
options.help: Replace the bridge extension ID only.

ips-sniffer-mode.name: ips-sniffer-mode
ips-sniffer-mode.help: Enable/disable the use of this interface as a one-armed sniffer.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable determining a user's identity from packet identification.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable determining a user's identity from packet identification.

subst.name: subst
subst.help: Enable to always send packets from this interface to a destination MAC address.

options.name: disable
options.help: Do not send packets from this interface.

virtual-mac.name: virtual-mac
virtual-mac.help: Change the interface's virtual MAC address.

substitute-dst-mac.name: substitute-dst-mac
substitute-dst-mac.help: Destination MAC address that all packets are sent to from this interface.

speed.name: speed
speed.help: Interface speed. The default setting and the options available depend on the interface hardware.

status.name: status

options.name: none
options.help: Interface not dedicated for any purpose.

options.name: management
options.help: Dedicate this interface for management purposes only.

trust-ip-1.help: Trusted host for dedicated management traffic (0.0.0.0/24 for all hosts).

trust-ip-2.name: trust-ip-2
trust-ip-2.help: Trusted host for dedicated management traffic (0.0.0.0/24 for all hosts).

trust-ip-3.name: trust-ip-3
trust-ip-3.help: Trusted host for dedicated management traffic (0.0.0.0/24 for all hosts).

trust-ip6-1.name: trust-ip6-1
trust-ip6-1.help: Trusted IPv6 host for dedicated management traffic (::/0 for all hosts).

trust-ip6-2.help: Trusted IPv6 host for dedicated management traffic (::/0 for all hosts).

trust-ip6-3.name: trust-ip6-3
trust-ip6-3.help: Trusted IPv6 host for dedicated management traffic (::/0 for all hosts).

options.help: Monitor transmitted/received traffic on this interface.

NetFlow sample rate.  Sample one packet every configured number of packets
(1 - 65535, default = 1, which means standard NetFlow where all packets are sampled).

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable sFlow protocol on this interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable sFlow protocol on this interface.

sample-direction.name: sample-direction
sample-direction.help: Data that NetFlow collects (rx, tx, or both).

options.name: tx
options.help: Monitor transmitted traffic on this interface.

options.name: rx
options.help: Monitor received traffic on this interface.

options.name: both

options.name: disable

options.name: disable

inbandwidth.name: inbandwidth
inbandwidth.help: Bandwidth limit for incoming traffic (0 - 80000000 kbps), 0 means unlimited.

external.help: Enable/disable identifying the interface as an external interface (which usually means it's connected to the Internet).

options.help: Enable identifying the interface as an external interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable identifying the interface as an external interface.

mtu-override.name: mtu-override
mtu-override.help: Enable to set a custom MTU for this interface.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable VLAN trunk on this interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable VLAN trunk on this interface.

member.name: member

options.name: static
options.help: Use static aggregation, do not send and ignore any LACP messages.

options.name: passive
options.help: Passively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.

options.name: active
options.help: Actively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.

options.name: enable
options.help: Allow HA secondary member to send/receive LACP messages.

options.name: disable
options.help: Block HA secondary member from sending/receiving LACP messages.

options.name: NPU-GRE

options.name: Source-MAC

link-up-delay.name: link-up-delay

options.name: disable

ip6-dns-server-override.help: Enable/disable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.

ip6-extra-addr.name: ip6-extra-addr
ip6-extra-addr.help: Extra IPv6 address prefixes of interface.

ip6-allowaccess.name: ip6-allowaccess
ip6-allowaccess.help: Allow management access to the interface.

options.name: scim
options.help: System for Cross-domain Identity Management (SCIM) access.

ip6-send-adv.name: ip6-send-adv
ip6-send-adv.help: Enable/disable sending advertisements about the interface.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable sending advertisements about this interface.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable sending advertisements about this interface.

ra-send-mtu.name: ra-send-mtu
ra-send-mtu.help: Enable/disable sending link MTU in RA packet.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable sending link MTU in RA packet.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable sending link MTU in RA packet.

ip6-adv-rio.name: ip6-adv-rio
ip6-adv-rio.help: Enable/disable sending advertisements with route information option.

options.name: enable
options.help: Enable sending advertisements with route information option.

options.name: disable
options.help: Disable sending advertisements with route information option.

ip6-route-pref.name: ip6-route-pref
ip6-route-pref.help: Set route preference to the interface (default = medium).

options.name: medium
options.help: Medium route preferences in RA packet.

options.name: high
options.help: High route preferences in RA packet.

options.name: low
options.help: Low route preferences in RA packet.

route-pref.name: route-pref
route-pref.help: Set route preference to the interface (default = medium).

options.name: medium
options.help: Medium route preferences in RA packet.

options.name: high
options.help: High route preferences in RA packet.

options.name: low
options.help: Low route preferences in RA packet.

route-life-time.name: route-life-time
route-life-time.help: Route life time in seconds (0 - 65535, default = 1800).

ip6-prefix-mode.name: ip6-prefix-mode
ip6-prefix-mode.help: Assigning a prefix from DHCP or RA.

options.name: dhcp6
options.help: Use delegated prefix from a DHCPv6 client to form a delegated IPv6 address.

options.name: ra
options.help: Use prefix from RA to form a delegated IPv6 address.

ip6-delegated-prefix-iaid.name: ip6-delegated-prefix-iaid
ip6-delegated-prefix-iaid.help: IAID of obtained delegated-prefix from the upstream interface.

rdnss-life-time.name: rdnss-life-time
rdnss-life-time.help: Recursive DNS server life time in seconds (0 - 4294967295, default = 1800).

dnssl-life-time.name: dnssl-life-time
dnssl-life-time.help: DNS search list time in seconds (0 - 4294967295, default = 1800).

upstream-interface.name: upstream-interface
upstream-interface.help: Name of the interface that provides delegated information.

delegated-prefix-iaid.name: delegated-prefix-iaid
delegated-prefix-iaid.help: IAID of obtained delegated-prefix from the upstream interface.

subnet.name: subnet
subnet.help: Add subnet ID to routing prefix.

dhcp6-relay-source-interface.name: dhcp6-relay-source-interface
dhcp6-relay-source-interface.help: Enable/disable use of address on this interface as the source address of the relay message.

options.name: disable
options.help: Use address of the egress interface as source address of the relay message.

options.name: enable
options.help: Use address of this interface as source address of the relay message.

dhcp6-relay-source-ip.name: dhcp6-relay-source-ip
dhcp6-relay-source-ip.help: IPv6 address used by the DHCP6 relay as its source IP.

prefix-hint.name: prefix-hint
prefix-hint.help: DHCPv6 prefix that will be used as a hint to the upstream DHCPv6 server.

prefix-hint-plt.name: prefix-hint-plt
prefix-hint-plt.help: DHCPv6 prefix hint preferred life time (sec), 0 means unlimited lease time.

prefix-hint-vlt.name: prefix-hint-vlt
prefix-hint-vlt.help: DHCPv6 prefix hint valid life time (sec).

vrip6_link_local.name: vrip6_link_local
vrip6_link_local.help: Link-local IPv6 address of virtual router.

vrip6.name: vrip6
vrip6.help: IPv6 address of the virtual router.

vrdst6.name: vrdst6
vrdst6.help: Monitor the route to this destination.

vrdst-priority.name: vrdst-priority
vrdst-priority.help: Priority of the virtual router when the virtual router destination becomes unreachable (0 - 254).

ignore-default-route.name: ignore-default-route
ignore-default-route.help: Enable/disable ignoring of default route when checking destination.

options.name: enable
options.help: Ignore default route when checking destination.

options.name: disable
options.help: Do not ignore default route when checking destination.
